forms.name: Contact Form
forms.purpose: General contact, prayer requests, and ministry inquiries
forms.location: Main contact page, in section titled 'Send Us a Message'

fields.name: name
fields.label: Your Name
fields.description: How you would like to be addressed

submission.method: Edge function with fallback to email client
submission.fallback: Opens email client with pre-filled message to contact@shametoflame.faith

forms.name: Prayer Request Form
forms.location: Prayer request page, dedicated form for prayer submissions

fields.name: isAnonymous
fields.label: Submit anonymously
fields.description: Option to submit prayer request without identifying information

fields.name: name
fields.label: Your Name
fields.conditional: Not required if isAnonymous is checked

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email Address
fields.conditional: Not required if isAnonymous is checked

fields.name: allowSharing
fields.label: I give permission for my answered prayer to be shared as a testimony
fields.description: Permission to share answered prayer as testimony

submission.database: Stored in Supabase prayer_requests table with RLS policies
submission.privacy: All prayer requests are confidential and protected
submission.response_time: Personal prayer within 24 hours, response as appropriate

html_structure.note: Forms are built with Next.js and use React client-side hydration
html_structure.semantic_html: All forms use proper <form>, <label for=''>, <input id=''> structure
html_structure.accessibility: WCAG compliant with proper ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
html_structure.schema_markup: Contact page includes Schema.org ContactPage structured data
